page.title: 10 ******HOME LIFE******
page.content:
{One day of my life (11 July 1985)
I get up at 7.15am.For my breakfast I have cereal,toast and milk. I go to school at 8.50am.For work in the morning I have Assembly,mathematics and Topic, then I go home for dinner. For work in the afternoon I have some more topic, a story and Drama.Then I go home. When I get home I have my tea. At 8pm. I get ready for bed and I go to bed at half-past eight. Then I read a chapter of my 'reading book', sometimes I read more than a chapter. I am only allowed to read until 9o'clock. I get to sleep at about half-past nine.
